content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Hello Haoyu Wang, I am interested in renting out my apartment in Magdeburg. Let's focus on the rental price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I notice that the apartment is in great condition, however, the city center location might indicate a higher price. I am willing to pay 450 Euro.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because 450 Euro is too low for the prime city center location.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand that you are looking for a lower price. How about 500 Euro per month?
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because 500 Euro is still too low for the excellent location and facilities of the apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I can see that you have strong negotiation skills. How about 550 Euro per month?
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because 550 Euro is still not enough for the great condition and prime location of the apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I admire your determination. Let's say 600 Euro per month. This is the lowest I can go.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because 600 Euro is still too low for the apartment's location and condition.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I can see that we have different opinions. Let's agree on 650 Euro per month.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I agree to the price of [650] Euro!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
